title: What DAW do most producers use? - Quora

response.answer_text: Actually many producers use DAW according to their suitability and easiness for working.Its up to the producers to explore any particular DAW and make it suitable for it's use. Nowadays producers mainly work on Logicpro, protocols, ableton, fl studio etc. and many more which they find their user interface is comfortable to use. So we should select or use only that DAW in which we feel we feel comfort and can become expert.

Pro Tools is the standard. There are others used for various things, but Pro Tools is engineered towards recording live instruments. Most of the others are for Electronic Music, which means the minute you need to record a live instrument you fall short. If you make an electronic track you can easily import it into Pro Tools, the same can’t be said of the reverse.
